# Overview

This report is updated annually and divided into four seasonal reports.

<h2>[Spring](Spring.html)</h2>
  * Secchi Depth
  * Temperature
  * Chlorophyll
  * Zooplankton
  * Fish
  * Recent Trends - Delta Smelt, Longfin Smelt, Salmon
  * Metadata

<h2>[Summer](Summer.html)</h2>
  * Secchi Depth
  * Temperature
  * Chlorophyll
  * Zooplankton
  * Fish
  * Recent Trends - Delta Smelt, Microcystis, Vegetation
  * Metadata

<h2>[Fall](Fall.html)</h2>
  * Secchi Depth
  * Temperature
  * Chlorophyll
  * Zooplankton
  * Fish
  * Recent Trends - Delta Smelt
  * Metadata

<h2>[Winter](Winter.html)</h2>
  * Secchi Depth
  * Temperature
  * Chlorophyll
  * Zooplankton
  * Fish
  * Recent Trends - Delta Smelt
  * Metadata
